channel.title: Dice Match (Mini Game) on Multi Games Hoard
channel.description: Recent content in Dice Match (Mini Game) on Multi Games Hoard

item.title: Shortcuts of Dice Match
item.description:
%title%

  • Escape: Quits the game.
    • On Android, click back button.
  • Spacebar: Rolls the dice.
    • On Android, double tap with 1 finger.
  • T: Information about how much money you have.
    • On Android, double tap with 2 fingers.
